summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingGive BackUpgrade their skincare routine this holiday season with ELEMIS' The Gift of Pro-collagen Icons, an award-winning cleansing and moisturising duo.
details: DetailsBenefitsDeeply cleanses, nourishes, and smooths98% agreed the Pro-Collagen Cleansing balm quickly and easily removes makeup, daily grime, and visible pollutants*Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30 clinically proven to significantly reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles in 14 days***Independent User trials 2021. Results based on 120 people over 2 weeks**Independent Clinical Trials 2021. Results based on 37 people over 4 weeksKey IngredientsPadina Pavonica (Both Products): A brown algae found on the Mediterranean coast that is known to support the feeling of hydrationElderberry Oil (Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm): Contains high levels of essential Fatty Acids and other micronutrients that are key to keeping skin healthyIncludesPro-Collagen Cleansing Balm (1.7 oz)Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30 (1.69 oz)Item 2619259How To UseUse Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm daily as a cleanser: Warm a pea-sized amount of Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm between palms and then massage over face, neck and décolleté with light circular massage movements. Moisten fingertips and continue to massage. Remove with a warm, damp cleansing cloth.Use Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30 every morning after cleansing: Warm a pea-sized amount of Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30 between palms. Gently smooth over face, neck and décolleté in upward strokes.IngredientsPRO-COLLAGEN CLEANSING BALM: Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, PEG-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, PEG-8 Beeswax, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Stearate, Sambucus Nigra Oil, PEG-60 Almond Glycerides, Silica, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Oil, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Wax, Glycerin, Lecithin, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Linalool, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Geraniol, Acacia Decurrens Flower Wax, Rosa Multiflora Flower Wax, Tocopherol, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Cocoyl Hydrolyzed Collagen, Limonene, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil, Fragrance (Parfum), Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Menthol, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Leaf Oil, Citral, Padina Pavonica Thallus Extract.PRO-COLLAGEN MARINE CREAM SPF 30: Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Isononyl Isononanoate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Dimethicone, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Phenoxyethanol, Polyacrylate-13, Butylene Glycol, Cetyl Alcohol hydroxyacetophenone, Octocrylene, Stearic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Coco-Caprylate, Xanthan Gum, Chlorphenesin, Polyisobutene, Fragrance (Parfum), Disodium EDTA, Tocopherol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Glyceryl Polyacrylate, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Lecithin, Padina Pavonica Thallus Extract, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Polysorbate 20, Sorbitan Isostearate, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Porphyridium Cruentum Extract, Mimosa Tenuiflora Bark Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Extract, Collagen Amino Acids, Linalool, Citronellol,Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Potassium Sorbate, Limonene, Geraniol, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm daily as a cleanser: Warm a pea-sized amount of Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm between palms and then massage over face, neck and décolleté with light circular massage movements. Moisten fingertips and continue to massage. Remove with a warm, damp cleansing cloth.Use Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30 every morning after cleansing: Warm a pea-sized amount of Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF 30 between palms. Gently smooth over face, neck and décolleté in upward strokes.
ingredients: PRO-COLLAGEN CLEANSING BALM: Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil
Padina Pavonica Thallus Extract.PRO-COLLAGEN MARINE CREAM SPF 30: Aqua/Water/Eau
